title: Activities
intro: At Bethel High School, activities play a vital role in nurturing creativity, leadership, teamwork, and confidence among students.

categories.title: Sports & Games
categories.description: Physical education, indoor and outdoor sports to promote fitness and teamwork.

categories.title: Cultural Activities
categories.description: Dance, music, drama, and cultural programs that celebrate creativity and tradition.

categories.title: Arts & Crafts
categories.description: Drawing, painting, craft work, and creative expression for young minds.

categories.title: Clubs & Competitions
categories.description: Debates, quizzes, science exhibitions, and inter-school competitions.

closingNote: Our activities encourage students to explore their talents, build confidence, and grow into well-rounded individuals.
